message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product for $12000. It's a unique opportunity to acquire a high-value item that I'm confident you'll love. Let me know if you're interested!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $11500. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price for this unique item. Let me know if that's something you'd be willing to consider!
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit higher than that. How about $10800? I'm willing to pay a premium for the product, but I need to stay within my budget

I can see you're serious about the product, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $11000, but I'm not going to go any lower than that. This is a unique opportunity for you to get an incredible deal on a high-value item. Let me know if that's something you'd be willing to accept!
I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $11000. How about we meet in the middle at $10500? I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make sure I'm getting a good deal
